mapper.select: select procurement_detail_id, procurement_id, accessories_id, test_whether, material_type, procurement_num, conversion_rate, purchasing_unit, original_price_with_tax, original_currency, original_currency_tax, total_tax_price_in_original_currency, tax_rate from accessories_procurement_detail where procurement_detail_id = #{procurementDetailId}
mapper.insert: insert into accessories_procurement_detail(procurement_id, accessories_id, test_whether, material_type, procurement_num, conversion_rate, purchasing_unit, original_price_with_tax, original_currency, original_currency_tax, total_tax_price_in_original_currency, tax_rate) values (#{procurementId}, #{accessoriesId}, #{testWhether}, #{materialType}, #{procurementNum}, #{conversionRate}, #{purchasingUnit}, #{originalPriceWithTax}, #{originalCurrency}, #{originalCurrencyTax}, #{totalTaxPriceInOriginalCurrency}, #{taxRate})

insert into accessories_procurement_detail(procurement_id, accessories_id, test_whether, material_type, procurement_num, conversion_rate, purchasing_unit, original_price_with_tax, original_currency, original_currency_tax, total_tax_price_in_original_currency, tax_rate) values
(#{entity.procurementId}, #{entity.accessoriesId}, #{entity.testWhether}, #{entity.materialType}, #{entity.procurementNum}, #{entity.conversionRate}, #{entity.purchasingUnit}, #{entity.originalPriceWithTax}, #{entity.originalCurrency}, #{entity.originalCurrencyTax}, #{entity.totalTaxPriceInOriginalCurrency}, #{entity.taxRate})

insert into accessories_procurement_detail(procurement_id, accessories_id, test_whether, material_type, procurement_num, conversion_rate, purchasing_unit, original_price_with_tax, original_currency, original_currency_tax, total_tax_price_in_original_currency, tax_rate) values
(#{entity.procurementId}, #{entity.accessoriesId}, #{entity.testWhether}, #{entity.materialType}, #{entity.procurementNum}, #{entity.conversionRate}, #{entity.purchasingUnit}, #{entity.originalPriceWithTax}, #{entity.originalCurrency}, #{entity.originalCurrencyTax}, #{entity.totalTaxPriceInOriginalCurrency}, #{entity.taxRate})
on duplicate key update procurement_id = values(procurement_id), accessories_id = values(accessories_id), test_whether = values(test_whether), material_type = values(material_type), procurement_num = values(procurement_num), conversion_rate = values(conversion_rate), purchasing_unit = values(purchasing_unit), original_price_with_tax = values(original_price_with_tax), original_currency = values(original_currency), original_currency_tax = values(original_currency_tax), total_tax_price_in_original_currency = values(total_tax_price_in_original_currency), tax_rate = values(tax_rate)
mapper.update:
update accessories_procurement_detail
procurement_id = #{procurementId},
accessories_id = #{accessoriesId},
test_whether = #{testWhether},
material_type = #{materialType},
procurement_num = #{procurementNum},
conversion_rate = #{conversionRate},
purchasing_unit = #{purchasingUnit},
original_price_with_tax = #{originalPriceWithTax},
original_currency = #{originalCurrency},
original_currency_tax = #{originalCurrencyTax},
total_tax_price_in_original_currency = #{totalTaxPriceInOriginalCurrency},
tax_rate = #{taxRate},
where procurement_detail_id = #{procurementDetailId}
